tile.name: Accelerators
tile.description: Helps you quickly perform your everyday browsing tasks without navigating to other websites to get things done

tile.name: AccuWeatherTile
tile.description: Displays current weather condition and forecast for tomorrow with Accu Weather

tile.name: AeroXP
tile.description: Shows the latest forum posts on http://aeroxp.org

tile.name: Buddies
tile.description: Lists your contacts from Windows Live Messenger and their status

tile.name: BuddyList
tile.description: Lists your contacts from Windows Live Messenger and their status

tile.name: Calc
tile.description: Allows you to perform simple calculations

tile.name: Clock
tile.description: Shows nice clock on your LongBar

tile.name: CommunicationHistory
tile.description: Displays last 8 emails from your Outlook Inbox folder, shows number of unread emails in Inbox and enables you to open item by double-clicking on it

tile.name: DigitalClock
tile.description: Shows nice digital clock on your LongBar

tile.name: DiskInfo
tile.description: Shows a graphical representation of the free space for each of your partitions

tile.name: DriveList
tile.description: Shows a graphical representation of the free space for your hard and flash drives

tile.name: DriveMeter
tile.description: Shows free space on hard drives

tile.name: Facebook
tile.description: Displays your status, as well as any pokes, messages, or friend requests you might have

tile.name: GisMeteo
tile.description: Shows the weather from http://www.gismeteo.ru

tile.name: GoogleSearch
tile.description: Provides quick access to google search

tile.name: links
tile.description: Allows you to add shortcuts to the most recently used programs and files

tile.name: LockStatus
tile.description: Show you the Caps Lock, Num Lock and Scroll Lock indicators

tile.name: Multidesktop
tile.description: Allows you to switch between different desktops

tile.name: NetMonitor
tile.description: Shows your network statistics

tile.name: Notes
tile.description: Allows you to store some notes

tile.name: OutlookCalendar
tile.description: Shows the next 3 upcoming appointments from your Outlook Calendar

tile.name: OutlookTasks
tile.description: Shows a list of all incomplete tasks from your Outlook profile

tile.name: PeopleNearMe
tile.description: Shows you number of people near you using "People Near Me" feature of Peer to Peer infrastructure of Windows Vista

tile.name: PerformanceCounter
tile.description: Shows your CPU and memory usage statistics

tile.name: QuickLaunch
tile.description: Allows you to add shortcuts to the most recently used programs and files

tile.name: Search
tile.description: Allows you to search something on your computer

tile.name: ShortcutList
tile.description: Displaying a list of shortcuts to the files you drag'n'drop there

tile.name: SlideShow
tile.description: Shows slides with pictures from selected folder

tile.name: SlideShowTile
tile.description: Displays a random picture from your Pictures folder every 10 seconds

tile.name: StickyNotes
tile.description: Add a sticky note to your desktop or sidebar

tile.name: SysTray
tile.description: A tile that displays the content of the system tray

tile.name: TheVista
tile.description: A tile that shows news from http://thevista.ru. Requires .NET Framework 3.0 SP1

tile.name: Trash
tile.description: A tile that allowes you to drag files and folders on it to move them to your recycle bin. This tile works just as in Longhorn

tile.name: Tray
tile.description: A tile that displays the content of the system tray. It doesn't hide tray from taskbar like previous System Tray tile

tile.name: Twitter
tile.description: Shows updates from twitter

tile.name: User
tile.description: Shows user defined icon and allows quickly restart, shutdown, logout

tile.name: UTorrent
tile.description: Shows downloads and uploads for bittorent client uTorrent

tile.name: Volume
tile.description: Allows you to adjust the system volume and toggle muting

tile.name: Weather
tile.description: Shows the weather forecast

tile.name: Welcome
tile.description: Simple welcome tile that sports the PDC03 user picture animation

tile.name: Wmp
tile.description: Allows you to control your WMP from the sidebar
